description:
Do you want to create a cool animation using After Effects? Well, now you can. In this Udemy course we will create a Smart Phone Animation using Adobe After Effects.

I'm your host, Robin Behroozi. I'm an Artist, Web and Motion graphics designer, and I'll be your teacher for this Udemy course.

I've developed an easy way learn Adobe After Effects on Udemy by creating a Smart Phone Animation.

In just 1 hour, you will learn:

How to set Keyframes in the timeline for Position, Rotation, Opacity and Scale

How to use Easy Ease

How to use the Graph Editor to spice up your Animation

How to Speed Up or Slow Down your Animation

How to Import Assets

Keyboard Shortcuts to help you work faster in After Effects

By the end of this Udemy course, you will have created your very own Smart Phone animation. You'll also be able to apply what you've learned to your own projects.

If you've never taken After Effects before, don't worry. I've made this Udemy course easy to follow in a step by step process.

Please note. This course was made for Udemy only. If you are taking this class on another site, it should NOT be there. Only Udemy is authorized to give this class!

I hope to see you in the class.
title: Adobe After Effects for All Levels: Step-by-Step Animation
